result.execSummary:
The defendant Charles A. Perez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Disorderly Conduct - Domestic Abuse Repeater [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Domestic Abuse Repeater], an unclassified felony, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes:
Absolute sobriety unless valid prescription.
Any contact with S.P. may only be at PO's discretion.
Any continuing assessment, treatment, and counseling as deemed appropriate by PO.

15CF9 - Ct. 2, 15CF108 Cts. 1, 3, and 5 (all Felony BJ counts)>> on each count, 6 years TOTAL: 3 years incarceration and 3 years ES, concurrent to each other and to both counts above.
CREDIT as follows:
14CF677 Ct. 1>>0 credit
15CF09>>208 days credit  on each count
15CF108>>175 days credit on each count

CONDITIONS of ES>>Any continuing assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; Absolute sobriety unless as validly prescribed; Any contact with victim S.P. may only be at the PO's discretion; CC including DNA surcharges.

>>>Defendant IS eligible for both CIP and SAP in all counts

Case called: 10:05am. INCLUDES 14CF677, 15CF9, 15CF108. Clerk: Denise. State appears by ADA Mike Puerner. Defendant appears in custody and by Atty Pauline Toulouse. State indicates Matter was set for Arraignment and Mtn to Amend Complaint in 15CF9. Atty Toulouse did not file Mtn to Amend Complaint and moves orallly to amend cts 3, 4 & 5 in 15CF9 before proceeding with Arraignment. Arguments by Atty Toulouse. State provides case law to the Court to review.  COURT makes findings and denies Mtn to Amend Complaint 15CF9. Crt proceeds with Arraignment in 15CF9. W/R. Plea: NOT GUILTY in 15CF9. Bond to Continue. State has additionally filed new charges in 15CF108. Crt proceeds with Initial Appearance. Plea: Not Guilty on misd cts. State requests $10,000 cash bond with non waivable no contact order with S.P. Arguments. COURT ORDERS: Cash Bond $10,000 15CF108; Non Waivable No Contact with S.P.  Address: 424 N 4trh Ave Wausau WI 54401Atty Toulouse moves to amend bond in 15CF9 - crt denies. Crt notes No Contact Order in 15CF9. DATES: Prelim 2/11/15 @ 9:20am BR 5. CC: BR 1 & 5. . Adjourned: 10:23am.
and Demand for Discovery and Inspection
